Query.Sentence: SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM ANNOUNCES A INNER JOIN SERVICES S ON A.S_ID = S.S_ID #WHERE#
WITH TEMPORAL AS ( SELECT A.*, S.S_NAME FROM ANNOUNCES A INNER JOIN SERVICES S ON A.S_ID = S.S_ID WHERE A.A_ACTIVE ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM TEMPORAL #WHERE#

WITH TEMPORAL AS ( SELECT A.*, S.S_NAME, U.NAME, U.SURNAME, U.EMAIL, CASE WHEN A_START_HOUR < A_FINISH_HOUR THEN 'FALSE' ELSE 'TRUE' END AS multi_day FROM ANNOUNCES A INNER JOIN SERVICES S ON A.S_ID = S.S_ID INNER JOIN TUSER U ON U.USER_ = A.USER_ WHERE A.A_ACTIVE ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM TEMPORAL #WHERE#

SELECT A.A_ID, COUNT(AG.AG_ID) AS AGREEMENTS_COUNT, COUNT(DISTINCT C.C_ID) AS CONVERSATIONS_COUNT, S.S_NAME, A.A_TITLE, A.A_ACTIVE, SUM(CASE WHEN AG.AG_ACCEPTED = true THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ACCEPTED_AGREEMENTS_COUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN AG.AG_ACCEPTED = false THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DECLINED_AGREEMENTS_COUNT FROM ANNOUNCES A INNER JOIN SERVICES S ON A.S_ID = S.S_ID LEFT JOIN CONVERSATIONS C ON A.A_ID = C.A_ID LEFT JOIN AGREEMENTS AG ON C.C_ID = AG.C_ID #WHERE# GROUP BY A.A_ID, S.S_NAME, A.A_TITLE, A.A_ACTIVE;
WITH TEMPORAL AS ( select * from conversations c inner join agreements AG on AG.c_id = C.c_id where c.c_end_datetime is not null and AG.ag_accepted = TRUE ) select #COLUMNS# from TEMPORAL T #WHERE#
